description.value:
This thin leather cord bears delicate runic markings and threads through an item that can bear affixed talismans.

When you Affix a Talisman to that item, you can thread the talisman onto the cord, activating the cord's preserving effects. The cord is attuned to a particular school of magic, chosen when the cord was created. It gains the corresponding trait for that school. When you activate a talisman threaded through a cord with the same magic school trait that's also the cord's level or lower, attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:16]. On a success, that talisman is not consumed and can be used again.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
